name: Baldi's Redesigned SchoolHouse! Plus!!!
description:
Welcome to the full version of Baldi's Redesigned SchoolHouse!!!

                        The decompile is only an early acces for the full game and there is  more to come beyond V1. So stay tuned!!!!

                         BTW there are some bugs in the game but don't worry!!! I'l try to fix them

                                                                    THANKS FOR PLAYING!!!! COME BACK SOON!!!
